item.title: 顺应人工智能投资趋势，加拿大 Novacap 公司完成 10 亿美元数字基金募集
item.description: 加拿大私募股权公司 Novacap Investments Inc. 经过两年的筹资过程，已完成了一项 10 亿美元的基金，用于投资数字基础设施资产。【原文：Canadian private equity firm Novacap Investments Inc. has closed a $1 billion fund to invest in digital infrastructure assets after a two-year process of raising the money.】

item.title: Evercore 称纳斯达克 100 指数的历史性牛市还有很长的路要走
item.description: 自 2023 年开始以来，纳斯达克 100 指数几乎翻了一番，价值增加了 14 万亿美元。Evercore ISI 的里奇-罗斯（Rich Ross）已经做好了继续这一涨势的准备，他对一个熟悉的克星--债券收益率上升--的担忧不以为然。【原文：The Nasdaq 100 Index has nearly doubled since the start of 2023, adding $14 trillion in value in the process. Evercore ISI’s Rich Ross is prepared for that rally to continue, shrugging off fears of a familiar nemesis: rising bond yields.】

item.title: 印度央行出售美元可能再次为莫迪政府带来丰厚红利
item.description: 对印度联邦政府来说，货币下跌可能仍有一线希望。分析人士预计，印度储备银行为支撑卢比而大量抛售美元所赚取的利润，将使其在下一年再获得意外红利。【原文：India’s falling currency may still have a silver lining for its federal government. Analysts are penciling in another year of windfall dividend by the Reserve Bank of India courtesy the profits earned on selling massive amounts of dollars in its attempt to support the rupee.】

item.title: 德国央行称德国仍在努力摆脱停滞状态
item.description: 德国联邦银行认为，德国经济目前不太可能出现有意义的复苏。【原文：A meaningful recovery in Germany’s economy is unlikely at the moment, according to the Bundesbank.】

item.title: 挪威即将迎来首次降息：决策指南
item.description: 挪威银行将在 3 月份重申其在大流行病后首次削减借贷成本的计划，但除此之外采取进一步措施的前景并不明朗。【原文：Norges Bank is set to restate plans for its first post-pandemic cut in borrowing costs in March, though the outlook for further steps beyond that is clouded.】

item.title: 道达尔能源公司聘请华盛顿游说者以重振莫桑比克液化天然气项目
item.description: 道达尔能源公司（TotalEnergies SE）聘请了一名华盛顿说客，帮助批准关键的出口融资，以重振因安全威胁而搁置多年的莫桑比克液化天然气项目。【原文：TotalEnergies SE hired a Washington lobbyist to help approve key export financing in an effort to revive its Mozambique liquefied natural gas project, which has been on hold for years due to security threats.】

item.title: 捷克决策者预计 2 月降息，但进一步路径不明
item.description: 捷克央行董事会成员扬-普罗查兹卡（Jan Prochazka）表示，捷克央行应能在下个月恢复货币宽松政策，尽管采取更多行动的前景受到国内和外部风险的共同影响。【原文：The Czech central bank should be able to resume monetary easing next month, though the outlook for more action is clouded by a mixture of domestic and external risks, according to board member Jan Prochazka.】

item.title: 特朗普为何赦免 "丝绸之路 "创始人罗斯-乌尔布里希特？
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统上任第二天，就向黑暗网络市场丝绸之路的创始人罗斯-乌尔布里赫特（Ross Ulbricht）颁布了全面赦免令。特朗普曾承诺释放 Ulbricht，这是他在竞选期间向加密货币社区做出的一系列承诺的一部分。【原文：On his second day back in office, President Donald Trump issued a full pardon to Ross Ulbricht, the founder of dark-web marketplace Silk Road. Trump had pledged to free Ulbricht as part of a raft of promises made to the cryptocurrency community while on the campaign trail.】

item.title: 银行家为收购卡洛医疗保健销售公司提供高达 10 亿欧元的债务支持
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，银行正在提出约 10 亿欧元（10.5 亿美元）的一揽子债务计划，以支持对 Karo Healthcare 的潜在收购。【原文：Banks are pitching around €1 billion ($1.05 billion) in debt packages to back a potential buyout of Karo Healthcare, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 印度联合利华因一次性收益而实现超预期利润
item.description: 印度斯坦联合利华有限公司（Hindustan Unilever Ltd.）公布的季度利润超过预期，主要得益于一次性收益的推动，尽管这家消费品巨头面临着世界上人口最多的国家消费放缓的问题。【原文：Hindustan Unilever Ltd. posted quarterly profit that beat estimates boosted by one-time gains even as the consumer goods giant faces a consumption slowdown in the world’s most-populous nation.】

item.title: 世界第二大柑橘出口国南非检测到芽腐病
item.description: 南非是仅次于西班牙的世界最大柑橘出口国，该国官员在两个省的商用木瓜果园中发现了芽腐病，并警告农民在移动植物时要小心谨慎，以阻止其蔓延。【原文：Officials in South Africa, the world’s biggest exporter of citrus after Spain, discovered bud rot in commercial papaya orchards in two provinces and warned farmers to exercise caution when moving plants to stop the spread.】

item.title: 达沃斯正在学习与特朗普的 "交易艺术
item.description:
参加世界经济论坛的领导人正在重新调整他们的优先事项和商业计划，以更好地适应新总统的议程。【原文：

Leaders gathering for the World Economic Forum are realigning their priorities and business plans to better fit the new president’s agenda.

】

item.title: 财富基金进军美元市场，沙特债券热潮持续不断
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯的债券狂潮还将继续，该主权财富基金准备在周三出售美元债务。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s bond spree is set to continue, with the sovereign wealth fund preparing to sell dollar debt on Wednesday.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长埃斯克里瓦称下周 "最有可能 "降息
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员何塞-路易斯-埃斯克里瓦（Jose Luis Escriva）表示，由于近期数据证实了通胀前景，下周会议上再次降低借贷成本的可能性非常大。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Jose Luis Escriva said another reduction in borrowing costs at next week’s meeting is very probable as recent data confirm the outlook for inflation.】

item.title: 德国可能需要比计划更长时间保留后备煤电厂
item.description: 电网运营商 Amprion GmbH 公司警告说，由于建造新天然气发电厂的计划严重滞后，德国可能需要在比预期更长的时间内保留其停运的燃煤发电站。【原文：Germany may need to keep its fleet of mothballed coal-fired stations available for longer than expected as a drive to build new gas plants is severely behind schedule, grid operator Amprion GmbH warned.】

item.title: 西班牙首相在 BBVA 的萨瓦德尔竞购案上听从监管机构意见
item.description: 西班牙首相佩德罗-桑切斯（Pedro Sanchez）对更大的竞争对手 BBVA SA 拟收购萨瓦德尔银行（Banco Sabadell SA）一事的是非曲直暂不作评判，尽管他的政府此前曾表示强烈反对这一银行业交易。【原文：Spanish Prime Minister Pedro Sanchez withheld judgment on the merits of the proposed takeover of Banco Sabadell SA by larger rival BBVA SA, even though his government previously expressed strong opposition to the banking deal.】

item.title: 中国放宽长期资金管理规定以促进股市发展
item.description: 中国推出了一揽子稳定股市的措施，其中包括计划提高养老金投资国内上市公司的额度，以应对唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）第二任总统任期内的不确定性。【原文：China rolled out a basket of measures to stabilize its stock markets, including plans to boost the amount pension can invest in the nation’s listed companies, as it combats uncertainty in a second Donald Trump presidency.】

item.title: 施莱格尔说：瑞士联合银行的干预措施奏效了，我们还能再来一次
item.description: 瑞士国家银行行长马丁-施莱格尔（Martin Schlegel）表示，瑞士国家银行之前在货币市场上的行动取得了成功，如果有必要，官员们不会回避再次使用这一工具。【原文：The Swiss National Bank’s actions in the currency market were previously successful and officials won’t shirk from resorting to that tool again if needed, according to President Martin Schlegel.】

item.title: 油轮改道前往受制裁阻碍的俄罗斯太平洋港口
item.description: 过去从俄罗斯西部港口运输石油的油轮正被调往该国东部，为一条通往中国的重要原油航线提供服务，这条航线因美国的全面制裁而瘫痪。【原文：Tankers that used to haul oil from Russia’s western ports are being redeployed to the nation’s east to service a key crude route to China that’s been crippled by sweeping US sanctions.】

item.title: 交易员权衡特朗普的关税威胁，国债保持稳定
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的最新关税威胁被投资者视为比担心的要温和，美国债券周三企稳。【原文：US bonds steadied on Wednesday after Donald Trump’s latest tariff threats were seen by investors as milder than feared.】

item.title: 德国寻求储气补贴，欧洲夏季天然气溢价飙升
item.description: 在德国表示可能为储气库的再充气提供补贴后，欧洲今年夏天交付的天然气价格比明年冬天的价格更加昂贵。【原文：European natural gas for delivery this summer has become even more expensive than prices for next winter after Germany signaled it may subsidize the refilling of storage sites.】

item.title: HDFC 银行利润增长符合分析师预期
item.description: 印度最大的私营贷款机构 HDFC 银行公布的第三季度利润符合市场预期，尽管其不良贷款总额有所增加。【原文：HDFC Bank, India’s largest private sector lender, posted third-quarter profits that came in line with market expectations even as its gross bad loans increased.】

item.title: 拉加德告诉 CNBC：欧洲央行并未落后于曲线，将逐步削减货币政策
item.description: 欧洲中央银行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）对美国有线电视新闻网（CNBC）表示，欧洲中央银行降息的速度不会太慢，并将继续采取有节制的宽松货币政策。【原文：The European Central Bank isn’t lowering interest rates too slowly and will maintain its measured approach to easing monetary policy, President Christine Lagarde told CNBC.】

item.title: 特朗普关税减免令欧洲基准股价创历史新高
item.description: 欧洲斯托克 600 指数自 9 月份以来首次创下历史新高，原因是投资者对美国可能不会实施最严厉的关税威胁持乐观态度。【原文：Europe’s Stoxx 600 index hit a record high for the first time since September, as investors grew optimistic that the harshest of threatened US tariffs may not be implemented.】

item.title: 印度尼西亚 PLN 据称计划发行 2020 年以来的首笔美元债券
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，印尼国家石油公司（PT Perusahaan Listrik Negara）已就发行多达15亿美元的美元债券向银行征求建议，这可能标志着该公司四年多来首次重返美国货币债务市场。【原文：Indonesia’s PT Perusahaan Listrik Negara has requested proposals from banks for a dollar bond offering of as much as $1.5 billion, according to people familiar with the matter, potentially marking its return to the US-currency debt market for the first time in more than four years.】

item.title: 北欧联合银行（Nordea）认为瑞典和挪威将在七月前完成宽松政策
item.description: 北欧联合银行（Nordea Bank Abp）的分析师表示，在北欧地区国内需求有望反弹的背景下，瑞典和挪威的央行都有可能在不到六个月的时间内结束本轮宽松政策。【原文：Central banks in Sweden and Norway are both likely to end this easing cycle in less than six months amid an expected domestic demand-led rebound across the Nordic region, according to analysts at Nordea Bank Abp.】

item.title: 阿曼财富基金支持的集团启动航运部门首次公开募股
item.description: 在阿曼推进私有化进程之际，由阿曼主权财富基金支持的阿西亚德集团（Asyad Group SAOC）公布了其航运部门的首次公开募股计划。【原文：Asyad Group SAOC, backed by Oman’s sovereign wealth fund, unveiled plans for the initial public offering of its shipping unit, as the sultanate pushes forward with its privatization drive.】

item.title: 南非 12 月通胀率升幅低于预期
item.description: 南非 12 月份的通胀速度低于预期，为政策制定者在本月晚些时候降息提供了空间。【原文：South African inflation quickened at a slower pace than expected in December, providing room for policymakers to cut interest rates later this month.】

item.title: 沙特 PIF 在寻求现金的过程中以 9.07 亿美元出售投资组合公司
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯主权财富基金正在以 34 亿里亚尔（约合 9.07 亿美元）的价格出售一家技术服务公司，这将增加其国库资金，因为该基金准备增加本地支出。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s sovereign wealth fund is selling a technology services firm for 3.4 billion riyals ($907 million), boosting its coffers as it prepares to ramp up local spending.】

item.title: 挪威1.8万亿美元基金首席执行官逆势押注美国科技领域
item.description: 挪威1.8万亿美元主权财富基金负责人表示，愿意在未来几个月逆市而动的投资者应考虑抛售美国科技股和私人信贷，同时增持中国股票。【原文：Investors willing to go against the market in the coming months should consider selling US technology stocks and private credit, while boosting holdings in China, according to the head of Norway’s $1.8 trillion sovereign wealth fund.】
